column1: #Delete this row (row 1) and row 3 and 4 before use. Save as a csv. Only the first three columns are required. Any columns not used should be deleted. Do not include empty cells. This file has been populated for use with the required File Level Metadata (FLMD) Reporting Format. It lists the columns included in the FLMD csv. Only include the column headers used in the FLMD file.

column3: Definition
Required

column1: Provide entries for each Column Name from the data matrix in the data file.
column2: Provide variable units of measurement. Insert "N/A" when units aren't applicable. Data should be represented with units of measurement approved by the International System of Units (SI). Non-SI units are accepted for use and should be defined and referenced.
column3: A complete unambiguous description. Information may include: formulas used to calculate entry; definitions of coding systems (e.g. missing values, quality flags, etc.); detection limits; timestamp calculation; measurement of uncertainty, etc.
column4: Longer human-readable column name. Sometimes this may be identical to Definition or even Name.

column3: Name of the files in the data package
